attributes.contentHtml:
i did nothing wrong and i have my ppl that can prove that
and all that is written in the thread is TOTAL LIES to make me look bad
He forced rusjs to transfer ownership of affinity mc because He threatened him and he stole all our data and he stole all our hard work what did he expect me to do sit their quit lmao its not that i sweared to one person only that im a toxic person and i worked hard to reach what i am rn and im still working hard but these haters man.
i dont even have a paypal lmao saying i steal customers money
i never deleted a customers server i didnt even have spa :/ + u dont even have proof of that
calling me kid while im 14 and saying unprofessional well being a scammer and trying to make me look bad is not professional lmao
i didnt beg anyone to be staff rus is the one that asked me to be staff in affinity mc lmao
if i tell someone he is getting good news soon does that mean i am trying to nuke them have a brain for gods sake
treb is the one that asked if he can merge and i just helped him u can ask him if u want
i didnt give anyone any of my personal info lmao and that pic doesnt work like how ur brain doesnt work lmao
i never argued with anyone in a ticket and u dont have proof on that
i dont demote ppl for no reason i gave them their real position thats it u cant be doing a mod job and be management lol wth lmao
i didnt give my self executive i asked before i did that and i dont setup discord only i am pretty experienced and have enough knowledge about hosts
i think this clears everything this crazy man said so please dont trust what he said above its not true and u can dm if u have any questions
PxndaForLife I did not steal data nor did I force Rus to transfer ownership

PxndaForLife Lol pxnda you are really stupid 10 year old i have all proof and more screens you are kid and you should be banned from discord
